location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Map of the Persian Gulf, indicating area covered by the Bahrain oil concession

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:292 x 195 mm, on sheet 340 x 226 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:A map of the northern parts of the Persian Gulf, attached to the Bahrain oil concession agreement, with the Bahrain Islands coloured red, indicating the area covered by the concession agreement. The map also shows Kuwaitâ€™s territory, the Kuwait neutral zone, and the province of Hasa.Includes a typewritten note dated 12 May 1923, signed by Frank Holmes with an Arabic translation added below.
